plot: A number of eligible bachelors are housed with several prospective brides. But in order for love to blossom, the women must meet with the approval of the men's moms.
plot_en: A number of eligible bachelors are housed with several prospective brides. But in order for love to blossom, the women must meet with the approval of the men's moms.
plot_es: A number of eligible bachelors are housed with several prospective brides. But in order for love to blossom, the women must meet with the approval of the men's moms.
title: Momma's Boys
